message:
Add authentication system and database storage

Backend changes:
- Add JWT authentication with bcrypt password hashing (auth.py)
- Implement SQLite database with WAL mode (database.py)
- Add auth endpoints: register, login, /api/me
- Add storage endpoints: sessions, pictures, preferences, reports
- Add localStorage â†’ database migration endpoint
- Refactor server.py to use FastAPI with auth middleware
- Add comprehensive API documentation (API.md)

Database schema:
- users: Email/password accounts
- user_sessions: Editor states
- daily_pictures: Generated images (solves localStorage quota!)
- user_preferences: Voice configs, meta prompt, state config
- analysis_reports: Echoes, traits, patterns
- schema_version: Migration tracking

Testing:
- test_migration.py: Unit tests for migration logic
- test_real_migration.py: E2E test with real user data (4.79 MB migrated)

Frontend changes:
- Update voiceApi.ts to use sync API (removed polling)

Documentation:
- LOCALSTORAGE_AUDIT.md: Complete inventory of localStorage usage
- MIGRATION_SUMMARY.md: Migration strategy and storage comparison
- API.md: Full API reference

All tests passing with real user data!
